createaeronautics.ponder.stirling_engine: Generating Rotational Force using the Stirling Engine
The Stirling Engine generates rotational force by burning fuel
The engine provides a moderate amount of stress capacity
Fuel can be inserted by automatic means
death.attack.createaeronautics.stationar: %1$s was shot by a Stationary Potato Cannon
%1$s was shot by a Stationary Potato Cannon using %2$s
